title: Service Mesh 2.6.z to 3.0 premigration checklist
subtitle: Migrating from OpenShift Service Mesh 2.6 to 3

abstract.para: This document provides important information on how to migrate from an existing Service Mesh 2.6 instance to Service Mesh 3.0.

This information includes differences between Service Mesh 2.6 and Service Mesh 3, including a new operator, new resources, and changes to integrations such as OpenShift Observability and Kiali, as well as migration guides for mulitenant and cluster-wide depoloyments, with and without cert-manager.
